verbs.description: [V: sled] [ARG1: dog puppies] prepare for season the sled dog puppies from snow mountain ranch in grand county have started preparing for their first season in the snow now at 10 weeks old they ’ve been training 4 times a week granby grand county colorado alaskan huskies dog steven peterson sled dog grand county snow mountain ranch
